verbs.description: roosters and the ugly side of the poultry industry the sounds of chickens [V: can] be heard more and more as backyard chickens are gaining popularity each area has their own regulations on how many chickens you can have so the key is to plan ahead before diving into the adventure greg howes facebook cluck cluck cluck brian fikes
